entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Winnipeg (The Forks)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:42 a.m. CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
